mapper.insert: insert into user(id, phone,password,create_time,update_time) values (uuid(), #{phone},#{password}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update role password=#{item.password}, update_time=now() where 1=1 and id = #{item.id}
mapper.select: SELECT *, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime FROM user WHERE 1=1 and phone= #{phone} and password= #{password}
